鑈鑈鑈

鑈字的基本解释

鑈
niè
古同“镊”，镊子。
正。

鑈字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niè］
［《廣韻》奴協切，入帖，泥。］
(1)坚正。一说当作止。
(2)亦作“鑷”。镊子。夹持物件的工具。
[②]［nǐ］
［《廣韻》奴禮切，上薺，泥。］
同“檷1”。
(1)用以络丝的工具。
(2)塞于车轮下的制动装置。

鑈字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鑈； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1324第29
【廣韻】奴協切【集韻】諾叶切，?音捻。【揚子·方言】鑈，正也。【註】謂堅正也。　又【集韻】昵輒切，音聶。同鑷。　又【廣韻】奴禮切【集韻】乃禮切【正韻】乃里切，?音禰。同檷，絡絲具也。

鑈字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鑈字的起名意思

暂无。

鑈
Basic explanation of words
鑈
niè
Gu Tong "tweezers", tweezers.
positive.
鑈
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niè］
["Guangyun" Slave Xie cut, enter the post, mud. ]
(1) Firmness. Just say it as a stop.
(2) Also known as "tweezers". tweezers. Tools for holding objects.
[②]［nǐ］
["Guangyun" slave ceremony cut, top water chestnut, mud. ]
Same as "Ji 1".
(1) Tools for winding silk.
(2) The braking device tucked under the wheel.
鑈
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鑈; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1324 29
[Guang Yun] Slave Xie cut [Ji Yun] Noye cut, sound twist. [Yangtze Dialect] 鑈, Zhengye. [Note] That is Jianzheng.　[Jiyun] Niyeqie, sound Nie. Same as tweezers.　[Guangyun] Nu Liqie [Jiyun] is Liqie [Zhengyun] is Liqie,? Sound you. The same is true for winding silk tools.
鑈
